ygData.subject: Re: Kitasi's Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/27/99 6:45:09 PM Pacific Daylight Time, mrwayne@mindspring.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/27/99 6:45:09 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
mrwayne@... writes:

<< You said your STR was 87, 17 above the baseline. You should have put more
of your starting 25 into STR, but we can't change that now. To carry the
Bronze, you need to get some +STR items. Buy some +3 STR rings. You can
get a Purity Belt (+2 STR) for under 5pp. You also may want to consider
the Cracked Darkwood Shield (+9STR). There are many more items to choose
from >>

One good one is the spiked leather collar, very cheap and +3 str. Ive got a
38 palidan friend that still wears one :P
